metadata.title: Korean Real-Time Data Base (RTDB) for NEAR-GOOS
metadata.description: The NEAR-GOOS real-time database of Korea provides real-time oceanographic and meteorology data including water temperature, wave height, wave pressure, wind speed, wind direction, air temperature, humidity, and air pressure.  Data are obtained from coastal stations: Sokcho, Wangdo, Kwangan, Kyobon, Chulwoon, Seocheon, Taean, Incheon, Boksacho, Donongtan (Marado), Donghae gasfield, Ieodo, and Banseo.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To offer basic data service to NEAR-GOOS and GOOS communities as part of the NEAR-GOOS project.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
